thread.title: The Red Heels Are Coming Again, and This Time Dakota Johnson Is Keeping It Simple
thread.title_full: The Red Heels Are Coming Again, and This Time Dakota Johnson Is Keeping It Simple

author: Edward Barsamian
title: The Red Heels Are Coming Again, and This Time Dakota Johnson Is Keeping It Simple
text:
The Red Heels Are Coming Again, and This Time Dakota Johnson Is Keeping It Simple January 30, 2017 6:22 pm Expand Photo: Splash News 
It’s been well documented that Dakota Johnson has one of Hollywood’s most envied shoe games , and earlier today in Los Angeles, the Fifty Shades Darker star stepped out in yet another sculptural pair with a fresh kick of color. Johnson has a seemingly instinctive ability to mix lo-fi looks: Take the tee and jeans she recently wore with The Row’s embellished flats or the way she used Gucci’s old-school moccasins to put a polished spin on her ‘70s-inspired grunge ensemble. The magic behind today’s otherwise monochromatic look, however, was all in the sole. 
Johnson’s chunky red-heeled shoes combine the ladylike simplicity of a ballet skimmer with a Pop Art twist. Keeping the rest of the look simple, she opted for layers of black, including the season’s favorite tailored coat and tonal dress. Finishing the outfit were Saint Laurent’s retro-inspired sunglasses for a fun throwback vibe.
